Class IgniteTxMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<IgniteTxKey,IgniteTxEntry>
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.transactions.IgniteTxMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends AbstractMap<IgniteTxKey,IgniteTxEntry>
implements Externalizable
    Grid cache transaction read or write set.
